children.name: warm a2
children.definition: warm clothes or covers that are warm can keep in heat or keep out cold :
examples: here, put on your nice warm coat.
i don't have a warm winter coat.
those gloves look nice and warm.

children.name: light a2
children.definition: light (of clothes) made of thin material which is not very warm or allows you to be cool

children.name: waisted x
children.definition: waisted (of a piece of clothing) narrow at the waist :thắt eo, bó eo
examples: this particular jacket is rather waisted.

children.name: wasp-waisted x
children.definition: wasp-waisted(of a piece of clothing) very narrow at the waist : eo con ong

children.name: knitted x
children.definition: knitted/ knitmade using wool or thick cotton and two long needles: đan

children.name: modest x
children.definition: modest old-fashionedmodest clothing covers the body in a way that does not attract sexual interest : thùy mị, nhã nhặn, giản dị

children.name: uncrushable x
children.definition: uncrushable (of a fabric) resistant to creasing :không nhàu
examples: these wonderful containers are supposedly waterproof, dust proof and uncrushable.

children.name: wearable x
children.definition: wearable clothes that are wearable are easy to wear because they arecomfortable, acceptable in most :mặc được
examples: social situations and lookattractivein combination with other clothes.
unlike a lot of women's fashion magazines, it features clothes that are both affordable and wearable.

children.name: easy care x
children.definition: easy care describes clothes that do not need special treatment when they are washed : dễ giặt

children.name: well-worn x
children.definition: well-worn describes clothes that have been worn often and are becoming old :rất sờn

children.name: crumpled x
children.definition: crumpled cloth or clothing that is crumpled has a lot of lines or folds in it:có nhiều nếp gấp, vết nhăn
examples: an old man with untidy hair and a crumpled suit

children.name: drip-dry x
children.definition: drip-dry drip-dry clothing can be hung up to dry and does not need to be ironed: không nhăn sau khi khô, khỏi cần ủi

children.name: backless x
children.definition: backless a backless dress, swimsuit etc does not cover much or any of a woman’s back:hở lưng

children.name: sleeveless x
children.definition: sleeveless a piece of clothing which is sleeveless has no sleeves :không tay

children.name: strapless x
children.definition: strapless describes a piece of women's clothing, that does not have straps over the shoulders: khôngdây,có quai

children.name: sporty x
children.definition: sporty sporty clothes are designed to look attractive in a bright informal way, often looking like the type of clothes that you could wear for sports: thể thao, năng động

children.name: dress x
children.definition: dress describes men's suits, shirts or other clothes of the type that are worn at formal occasions :lịch sự,trang trọng, văn phòng
examples: a white dress shirt and bow tie
they didn't start wearing corporate suits but they proved they can dress in collared shirts and dress shoes.

children.name: dressy x
children.definition: dressy dressy clothes are suitable for formal occasions :tao nhã,lịch lãm
examples: i need something a bit more dressy for the wedding.
her outfit was smart but not too dressy.

children.name: casual b1
children.definition: casual describes clothes that are not formal or not suitable for formal occasions
examples: jean felt more comfortable incasual clothes.

children.name: formal b2
children.definition: formal describes clothes that are suitable for official occasions:
examples: we insist on formal dress for dinner.

children.name: informal b2
children.definition: informalinformal clothes are suitable for wearing at home or in ordinary situations
examples: the guys wore very informal clothes
cate nodded and slipped out of her informal dress that she had worn all day.
tickets are now available priced at £20 and 30 euro and the dress code is informal.

children.name: a line on cloth where it has been folded or crushed
crease x
children.definition: crease especially uk a line on a piece of clothing or material where it has been folded or crushed: nếp nhăn, nếp gấp
examples: when i unpacked my suitcase, all my shirts had creases in them.
creasedespecially uk [adj] clothes that are creased have a lot of creases in them:
your tie’s creased, you’ll have to iron it.
chris, as usual, came in wearing old jeans and a wrinkled t-shirt.

children.name: wrinkle c2
children.definition: wrinkle especially us a line in a piece of clothing that is caused when it has not been folded or hung properly, but instead has been left somewhere untidily: nếp nhăn, nhàu
examples: if you hang that dress over the bath, the steam will get the wrinkles out.
it’s made from a special fabric that doesn’t leave any wrinkles after you wash it.
wrinkledespecially us [adj] c2 clothes that are wrinkled or have a lot of wrinkles in them:
your tie’s creased, you’ll have to iron it.
chris, as usual, came in wearing old jeans and a wrinkled t-shirt.

children.name: hard-wearing x
children.definition: hard-wearinguk,long-wearingus used about materials and products that will remain in good condition for a long time even when they are used a lot : bền
examples: ceramic tiles are easy to keep clean and hard-wearing.

children.name: weatherproof x
children.definition: weatherproof weatherproof clothing or material can keep out wind and rain:chịu được mưa gió

children.name: showerproof x
children.definition: showerproofukwater-repellentus  (of clothing or material) not absorb water when it is raining lightly
examples: a spray-on treatment that makes paper and cloth maps water-repellent
this coat isn't waterproof, but it is showerproof.

children.name: reversible c2
children.definition: reversible a piece of clothing or material that is reversible can be worn with either side showing on the outside: hai mặt

children.name: machine washable x
children.definition: machine washable if clothes are machine washable, it is possible to wash them in a washing machine safely : giặt máy được

children.name: see-through x
children.definition: see-throughdescribes a piece of clothing that is very thin and light, under which you can see other clothes or the body: xuyên thấu

children.name: diaphanous x
children.definition: diaphanous literary diaphanous cloth is so thin that you can almost see through it :trong mờ

children.name: frilly x
children.definition: frillydecorated with lots of frills :có diềm bằng vải xếp nếp
examples: a baby in a white frilly dress

children.name: fringed x
children.definition: fringedwith a fringe : có tua

children.name: -neck x
children.definition: -neckedsuffixrefers to the type of neck someone or something has, or to the style of a piece of clothing around the neck or the way that it is worn
examples: open-necked[attri] describes a shirt which is not fastened at the neck :khôngcàikhuy, nút
scoop-neckdescribes a piece of women's clothing which is cut low around the neck in a u-shape

children.name: elasticated x
children.definition: elasticatedukelasticizedusclothes or parts of clothes that are elasticated have threads of elastic in them: chun, có dây chun
examples: a dress with an elasticated waist

children.name: -sleeved x
children.definition: -sleevedsuffixhaving the length of sleeves mentioned

children.name: strappy x
children.definition: strappyinformal (of shoes or clothes) having straps.

children.name: padded x
children.definition: paddedfilled or covered with a soft material to make it thicker or more comfortable or for protection:độn
examples: containing a layer of soft material used for protection or to give shape
it's a short jacket with paddedshoulders.
a paddedbra(= one with extra layers of material in it to make the breasts seem bigger)
the shoes are padded to protect the foot.

children.name: two-tone x
children.definition: two-tone clothes or shoes that are two-tone are two different colours or are a lighter and a darker type of the same colour: hai tông màu

children.name: distressed x
children.definition: distressed distressed furniture or clothes have been made to look older than they really are: cũ (cố ý)

children.name: stonewashed x
children.definition: stonewashed (of a new piece of clothing, especially one made of denim)have been washed with small stones so that they look older and paler: được làm bạc đi
